participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a passion for helping others.
participant_1.background: I like to spend my summers in warmer climates. I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time. I am a nurse. My favorite fruit is an apple. I got lost in Tokyo and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Innovative and artistic, with a love for nature and design.
participant_2.background: My favorite music is chill music, as it helps me to relax and concentrate on my work. I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills. I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest. My life's passion is designer French fries. I read children's books to make myself feel younger.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite music genre?
I love chill music. It helps me relax and concentrate on my work.
I love chill music too! What are your favorite artists?
I like Bonobo, Tycho, and Emancipator.
Oh nice! I haven't heard of Emancipator. I'll have to check them out.
They're great! I love their use of live instruments.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
Oh nice! I love flowers. I wish I had a green thumb.
It's not as hard as you think! Just takes some practice and patience.
Maybe I'll give it a try!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm not sure what I'd do with all the flowers though.
You could give them to friends and family! Or you could sell them at a farmer's market.
I'm not sure I'm ready to start my own business.
You could always start small. Just sell some flowers to your friends and family.
That's a good idea! I'll have to think about it.
You should! It would be a lot of fun.
